page.title: 06Environmental changes--Denny
page.content: {THE RIVER CARRON}flows past our school . We have been on several nature walks but have not seen many signs of life in the river. Even water beetles were scarce. The stones of the river bed were covered with slime. This may have come from past industries which let untreated waste empty into the river. {RE-CHEM}which destroys and makes safe dangerous chemicals by burning, has been under investigation for links with animal and human defects. As yet no trace of the{PCBs or DIOXINS}have been found in soil samples. Often there is a pungent odour throughout the area which is said to come from the{SEWAGE WORKS.}One particular sewage works converts the solid waste to cake blocks. It is from this process which the offensive odour is said to come. Perfume has been used in vain to sweeten the air.
